skins.selfIntroduction: I’m not like the other so-called "big sisters." I am Z1, the eldest of all Iron Blood destroyers, and bear countless resposibilities upon my shoulders. Rest assured, Commander, because the invincible Z1 is at your side.
skins.acquisition: Rejoice, Commander! Allow me, Z1, to handle all your problems from now on!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Let's see who can do this paperwork faster~!
skins.secretaryIdle2: My full name is Leberecht Maass, but you can call me Z1.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Do your best, Commander. I'll always be by your side~!
skins.secretaryTouch: Don’t be so wishy-washy if you’re greeting someone.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: You want some "hard love," is that it?

skins.shipDescription: Hmm... So this is a retrofit, huh? Not bad! Rejoice once more, Commander, for no task or enemy is too daunting for the new and improved Z1!
skins.acquisition: Hmm... So this is a retrofit, huh? Not bad! Rejoice once more, Commander, for no task or enemy is too daunting for the new and improved Z1!
skins.login: You're finally here! Come on, I want to start brawling already!
skins.details: Heheh~ The mighty Z1 can get even stronger and faster!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Even my work productivity has doubled! Commander, can you even keep up with me~?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Viersechs, if you want a name, let me choose a great one for you: "Iron Blood Warrior Princess, Ritter der Walküre!" ...H-huh? You don't like it?!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, do you feel like you can't get anything done without me? Ahahaha~!
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, I can't have you being this listless! Allow the great Z1 to pump you up!

skins.shipDescription: Because she’s the Z1, her results will of course be NO.1! Hehe, no matter where she goes, Z1-sama will always be the best!
skins.acquisition: Because she’s the Z1, her results will of course be NO.1! Hehe, no matter where she goes, Z1-sama will always be the best!
skins.details: Bringing weapons to school is merely for self-defense purposes. There are always some bold fool who wishes to taunt Z1-sama!
skins.secretaryIdle1: The homework was finished in a flash, hehe, naturally for my Z1-sama!
skins.secretaryIdle2: I did not break classroom rules! It’s just that the teacher is too boring, I recommend to everyone that I should teach the class, then...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Hehehe, stuff written on books may not always be correct!
skins.secretaryTouch: Naturally, only the Commander can be called my most desirable partner!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: People say when your head is pointed by a gun, your brain starts spinning. Commander, care to have a try?
